data.title: Fix minor typo in Doxygen configs
data.body: This patch fixes a few minor typos I found while reading the Doxygen configuration file. Thanks!

data.title: Hosted v3.x API Reference missing some Doxygen generated files
data.body:
I've noticed that some classes didn't exist on the [latest v3.12 documentation](http://cocos2d-x.org/docs/api-ref/cplusplus/v3x/) but didn't really investigate till [this forum thread](http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/is-label-being-deprecated/30839) from yesterday.

I generated the v3.12 docs offline from the latest build of this repository, and found that docs for classes like `Label` and `Action` existed, however, they don't exist on the v3.12 docs hosted on cocos2d-x.org.

I'm guessing it either hasn't been updated in a while, or there is something wrong with the generation of that instance of docs.

Steps to generate the docs offline:
1. Clone this repository
2. Install [Doxygen](http://www.stack.nl/~dimitri/doxygen/index.html) on OSX using [Homebrew](http://brew.sh/) with: `brew install doxygen --with-dot --with-doxywizard --with-libclang`. (This bit takes a while because LLVM is a dependency).
3. `cd` into `cocos2d-x/docs`
4. Execute `/usr/local/bin/doxygen doxygen.config`
5. Open `cocos2d-x/docs/html/annotated.html` in a browser to view the latest v3.12 docs

data.title: UILayoutComponent refactor
UIWdiget: new size type - RelativeToParent
data.body: Currently UIWidget has two size types - _absolute_ and _percent_. And these two types suitable for almost all situations. But i want to request another type: _relative to parent._ In that case size calculated as: "parent_size - value". It can be used when we want to make **fixed spacings** from left/right or top/bottom.

data.title: Refactor UIWidget to always use UILayoutComponent
data.body:
I'm am trying to look into new UI system again. And find it quit hard to follow.

UIWidget and UILayoutComponent have duplicate functionality. UIWidget can use UILayoutComponent and also can not use. In case it not uses UILayoutComponent - it duplicates almost the same code. Also the same things called differently for those two classes. May be in all cases should be used UILayoutComponent to remove some ambiguity?

A contentSize of UIRIchText is not updated
data.body:
When creating the RichText, be acquired a contentSize in getContentSize(), it is not set.

In RichText::formarRenderers(), if _ignoreSize is false, although to calculate the newContentSizeHeight variable, is not set.

1797 line, and add the following code after "delete [] maxHeights;", contentSize was to be updated.

```
this->setContentSize(Size(this->getContentSize().width, newContentSizeHeight));
```

Or there is no problem in this fix?

However, the RichText::formarRenderers() is called, the timing to be visited.

Before calling a UIRichText of getContentSize(), there is a need to call formatText ().

Here also supports or not a problem?

When subjected to this fix, there is a side effect to the code on the assumption that the contentSize is not updated.

For example, cpp-tests.

data.title: Use fstat instead of fseek and ftell for performance and portability
rendertexture's savetoFile problem
data.body: when draw a label to the render texture and call the savetoFile to create the png file.the png file have white border on ios platform. because the label use ALPHA_NON_PREMULTIPLIED blend mode. and on ios platform the image-ios.mm savetoFile only use the kCGImageAlphaPremultipliedLast flag

In cocos2d-html, a ListView nest in a PageView, and the elements of ListView can't display.
It works properly in iOS.

engine: v3.10, v3.11, v3.12

data.title: [Cocos2d-x 3.12] Scene Transitions don't work correctly with a ListView child
data.body:
Some (most) Transitions aren't rendered correctly in the 'from' `Scene` there is a `ListView`.

How to test the provided code:
1) Replace the two files in the 'HelloWorld' project (Classes folder).
2) Bulid and run
3) Click on the power button to generate a scene transition

The transition seems to work fine only if the clipping is disabled on the`ListView`.

[Test.zip](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/files/361007/Test.zip)

data.title: Add missing override keyword
data.body:
When compiling cocos2d-x v3.12 with Android NDK r11 and Clang, I get the following warning message about `-Winconsistent-missing-override`. This patch adds missing `override` keyword at the end of function declaration. Thanks.

```
cocos2d/cocos/ui/UIEditBox/UIEditBoxImpl-android.h:73:18: warning: 'setNativeMaxLength' overrides a member function but is not marked 'override' [-Winconsistent-missing-override]
    virtual void setNativeMaxLength(int maxLength);
                 ^
```

data.title: fix crash in EaseExponentialOut::clone()
data.body: This is just an obvious bug fix. It always returns nullptr.
